column4: Hi there, How do I login with the root user? I have a game that I installed under /root/ and it won't let me open it!
You don't want to log in as root
And you don't want to run games as root really either :)
Well, what do I want to do?
You want to either install it to home, or chmod it so you can run it as a regular user
I would reinstall the game not as root since it installed to /root/ instead of /home/$USER/
